# Life Sense (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[Spirit (Domain)|Spirit 1]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** 0

**Area:** 60‐ft. radius

**Duration:** Concentration, up to 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** The Mage's Tower

You can sense the presence of life forces. The amount of information revealed depends on how long you focus your attention on a particular area or subject.

‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐Aura Power‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐


| | **Faint** | **Moderate** | **Strong** | **Overwhelming** |
|---|---|---|---|---|
| Creature (HD) | 3 or lower | 4‐10 | 11‐15 | 16 or higher |

*1st Round:* Presence or absence of a life force.

*2nd Round:* Number of life forces (creatures) in the area and the power of the most potent life force present.

*3rd Round:* The power and location of each life force. If a life force is outside your line of sight, then you discern its direction but not its exact location.

The spell can penetrate barriers, but 10 feet of stone, 1 foot of common metal, a one inch thick sheet of lead, or 30 feet of wood or dirt blocks it.
